    • Method Detail

      • get

        public java.util.List<Flooring> get(Constraints<FlooringColumn> constraints)
        Returns the floorings in the data storage. The results can be constrained using the provided constraints.
        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints that modify the resulting list.
        Returns:
        The list of the floorings in the data storage.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When an exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • get

        public java.util.List<Flooring> get()
        Returns the floorings in the data storage.
        Returns:
        The list of the floorings in the data storage.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When an exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • first

        public Flooring first(Constraints<FlooringColumn> constraints)
        Returns the first flooring matching the provided constraints.
        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints that modify the resulting list.
        Returns:
        The first flooring matching the provided constraints. Returns null when no constraints matches the provided constraints.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When an exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • create

        public Flooring create(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       boolean active)
                throws FlooringValidatorException
        Inserts a new flooring into the data storage.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the flooring to create.
        description - The description of the flooring to create.
        active - Whether or not the flooring can be applied to orders.
        Returns:
        The flooring instance representing the newly created flooring.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When an exception occurs while performing the operation.
        FlooringValidatorException - When the provided information is considered invalid.

      • update

        public boolean update(int id,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      boolean active)
               throws FlooringValidatorException
        Updates the entity in the data storage to match the provided flooring.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the flooring to update.
        name - The new name of the flooring.
        description - The new description of the flooring.
        active - The new active status.
        Returns:
        true if the record was updated.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When an exception occurs while performing the operation.
        FlooringValidatorException - When the provided information is considered invalid.
